ClientSignoseis
Year2012 - 2013
LocationArgentina
DeliverablesWebsite

Product design proposal

The challenge

Signoseis is an small filmmaker studio of Buenos Aires, Argentina, that reached us with the need of having an online presence.

They already have some brand design made, so, using that material, we designed and developed an institutional website that showcased their work, and let visitors, or future clients, know them better by showing how their design process is. They also write news about them, so we develop a blog module on the website. All was developed using Drupal CMS. We also took care of branding their social media pages.

Responsibilities
Design
  • Company website design.
Code
  • Front-end development.
  • Integration with Drupal.
Social media
  • Facebook & Twitter branding.
